channel.title: TCAM on Prasenjit Manna
channel.description: Recent content in TCAM on Prasenjit Manna

item.title: Longest Prefix Matching(LPM)
item.description: Longest Prefix Matching (LPM) In general, LPM (Longest prefix match) is an important know how in routing. There are topic like TCAM, Trie, Multibit trie, Compressed Trie/Patricia Tie, Bloom Filter, Hash Table, etc, are considered in routing lookup. These are few articles created the gist for it. Longest Prefix Matching in Networking Chips by Sharada Yeluri Hashing Strategies for Packet Processing by Diptanshu Singh Packet Classification for High Speed Packet Processing
